root.name: Aqua Forest
root.description: AvailibiltyAqua Forest is available in iTunes App store or can be downloaded directly to an iPhone or iPod touch via the App Store. Aqua Forest sells for US$7.99.EngineAqua Forest is powerd by the "Octave Engine". This engine is 2D based muti-physics engine powered for simple casual games. Aqua Forest also utalized the iPhone's or iPod touch's accelormeter. This allows the liquids or gases to be moved around by titling the device. The engine creates realistic water movements
